channel.title: Kokujin Chronicles Podcast
channel.description: Kokujin Chronicles is an audio journal of my pursuit of a life-long desire to visit, live and work in Asia.
channel.itunes:subtitle: One man's adventures and misadventures in Asia.
channel.itunes:author: Kokujin Chronicles
channel.itunes:summary: Kokujin Chronicles is an audio journal of my pursuit of a life-long desire to visit, live and work in Asia.

item.title: Episode 008: OMG! I'm in China!
item.description: ...and they said I couldn't possibly pull it off. Yep. I am now in the People's Republic of China, in the capital city, Beijing. How the heck did that happen? Glad you asked. Enjoy! Subscribe to the audio feed via: http://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/kokujin-chronicles-podcast/id435211331 | http://kokujinchronicles.podomatic.com Find show notes, links and additional content at: http://kokujinchronicles.wordpress.com | https://www.facebook.com/kokujin.chronicles email rants, raves or questions to: kokujin.chronicles@hotmail.com | kokujin.chronicles@gmail.com

item.title: Will It Work With Linux
item.description:
I produce a podcast. I needed an interface to my computer. The Presonus 1Box kit seemed to meet my price point and other requirements. BUT, does it work with Linux?

Presonus 1Box: http://www.presonus.com/products/Detail.aspx?ProductId=60

Guitar Center discount: http://www.guitarcenter.com/PreSonus-1Box-Audiobox-Collector-s-Edition-Record...

Ubuntu Studio: http://ubuntustudio.org/

Audacity:http://audacity.sourceforge.net/

Jamendo/Blue Canoe records: http://www.jamendo.com/en/album/40092

Subscribe to the audio feed via: http://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/kokujin-chronicles-podcast/id435211331 | http://kokujinchronicles.podomatic.com

Find show notes, links and additional content at: http://kokujinchronicles.wordpress.com | https://www.facebook.com/kokujin.chronicles

email rants, raves or questions to: kokujin.chronicles@hotmail.com | kokujin.chronicles@gmail.com

item.title: Episode 006: Would'a Could'a Should'a
item.description: A detailed and fairly technical discussion of the resources available to potential CELTA and/or CertTESOL candidates. Prior preparation prevents piss poor performance. Enjoy! Subscribe to the audio feed via: http://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/kokujin-chronicles-podcast/id435211331 | http://kokujinchronicles.podomatic.com Find show notes, links and additional content at: http://kokujinchronicles.wordpress.com | https://www.facebook.com/kokujin.chronicles email rants, raves or questions to: kokujin.chronicles@hotmail.com | kokujin.chronicles@gmail.com

item.title: Episode 005: Tales of Thailand 3
item.description: The 3rd and final chapter of Tales of Thailand. Thanks to Brother Mouzone for making this interview so much fun. Enjoy! item.title: Episode 004: Tales of Thailand 2
item.description:
Brother Mouzone continues to interrogate me about my visit to Bangkok.  I come face-to-face with 18 good reasons to go to Asia.  I learn a surprising fact that forces an overhaul of my Asian strategy.

 

Subscribe to the audio feed via: http://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/kokujin-chronicles-podcast/id435211331 | http://kokujinchronicles.podomatic.com

Find show notes, links and additional content at: http://kokujinchronicles.wordpress.com | https://www.facebook.com/kokujin.chronicles

item.title: Episode 003: Tales of Thailand
item.description:
Kokujin Chronicles news, a simple request and Brother Mouzone takes control of the microphone to interview ME about my visit to Bangkok.  (After which we headed out for beer & tacos!)  Enjoy!

Subscribe to the audio feed via: http://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/kokujin-chronicles-podcast/id435211331 | http://kokujinchronicles.podomatic.com

item.title: Episode 002: Brother Mouzone does Morocco
item.description:
Kokujin Chronicles news, contact/feedback information AND an extended interview with my friend "Brother Mouzone" about his trip to Morocco. Enjoy!

item.title: Episode 999: "OFFICIAL" Kokujin Chronicles Theme
item.description:

item.title: The OFFICIAL Kokujin Resume/CV
item.description:
Kokujin Chronicles is produced by an articulate, erudite and talented education and training professional who, coincidentally, is presently between jobs. This episode presents a brief snapshot of Kokujin's professional experience.

Subscribe to the audio feed via: http://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/kokujin-chronicles-podcast/id435211331 | http://kokujinchronicles.podomatic.com

Find show notes, links and additional content at: http://kokujinchronicles.wordpress.com | https://www.facebook.com/kokujin.chronicles

item.title: Kokujin Chronicles Promotional Spot
item.description:
"The method behind the madness." This promotional spot is intended to give new listeners and potential sponsors an idea of what this podcast is about. It is also suitable for podcasters interested in cross-promotion. Enjoy!

Subscribe to the audio feed via: http://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/kokujin-chronicles-podcast/id435211331 | http://kokujinchronicles.podomatic.com
